decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal">The
development hereby permitted shall be carried out, completed and thereafter retained in accordance with the
following approved plans and documents:</p><p class="MsoNormal">Site
Plan; Block
Plan; 283-1
– Existing Plan [and Elevations]; 283-2
– Retrospective Proposed Plans [and Elevations]; Fire
Safety – Reasonable Exemption Statement&nbsp;</p>

<p class="MsoNormal">Notwithstanding
the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)
(England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or
without modification), no window(s) or door(s), other than those shown on the
approved plans shall be installed in the north elevation facing 285 Kings
Avenue, and south elevation of the first floor addition facing 281 Kings Rd, in
the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the
local planning authority.<font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></font></p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey front extension incorporating front porch; single and two storey side to rear extension; single storey rear extension; rear dormer; front entrance ramp (demolition of attached garage and store room) (partially retrospective)
